A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I don't know what the critics are seeing.  It's as if they were blinded by hype and expectations or something. 
Because TLJ ruins the franchise by ignoring key issues and adding the wrong things.   

With director firings and a poor set up for Ep IX\, I would recommend NOT to feed Disney money until they can correct things by bringing audiences a worthy Kenobi film.

And it's not just internet "trolls" who hate this film btw.  I know that at my packed theater\, nobody walked out happily and excited like they did Rogue One or TFA.  Instead\, there was meh expressions and silence abroad.

3/10 for a 1.5 RT score.
